// import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import "./style.scss"; function App() { const [isMenuOpen, setOpenMenu] = useState(false); const closeMenu = (element) => { element.target.classList[0] === "header__menu" ? setOpenMenu(false) : console.log("No"); }; return (
